languages.text: "Ты сам говоришь, что никто не чист, включая тебя и твоих братьев. Ее суд не обойдет вас стороной — вы сгинете".

traits.locale_text: "Ты сам говоришь, что никто не чист, включая тебя и твоих братьев. Ее суд не обойдет вас стороной — вы сгинете".

languages.text: "You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."
languages.original_text: "Ты сам говоришь, что никто не чист, включая тебя и твоих братьев. Ее суд не обойдет вас стороной — вы сгинете".

traits.locale_text: "You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brothers and sisters. Her justice will not pass you by; you will perish too."
"You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brothers and sisters. Her justice will not pass you by; you will perish too."
"You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your comrades. Her justice will not pass you by; you will perish too."
"You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your comrades. Her justice will not pass you by; you will perish too."
"You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."
"You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."

languages.text: “你自己说过，没有人是纯洁无瑕的，无论是你自己，还是你的教友。她的正义不会放过你们，你们也会一起被烧死。”
languages.original_text: "You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."

traits.locale_text: “你自己说过，没有人是纯洁无瑕的，无论是你自己，还是你的教友。她的正义不会放过你们，你们也会一起被烧死。”

languages.text: 「自分でも言っていただろう。純粋な人間などいない。お前も、お前の同胞たちもだ。彼女の正義から逃れることは出来ない。お前も一緒に死ぬことになる」
languages.original_text: "You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."

traits.locale_text: 「自分でも言っていただろう。純粋な人間などいない。お前も、お前の同胞たちもだ。彼女の正義から逃れることは出来ない。お前も一緒に死ぬことになる」

languages.text: «Usted mismo lo ha dicho: no hay nadie puro, incluidos usted y los suyos. Su justicia no le ignorará; usted también sucumbirá».
languages.original_text: "You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."

traits.locale_text: «Usted mismo lo ha dicho, nadie es puro, incluido usted y sus camaradas. Su justicia no pasará de largo, usted también fallecerá».

languages.text: "Ihr habt es selbst gesagt: Niemand ist rein, auch Ihr und Eure Brüder nicht. Ihre Gerechtigkeit wird nicht an Euch vorbeiziehen. Auch Ihr werdet sterben."
languages.original_text: "You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt es selbst gesagt: Niemand ist rein, auch Ihr und Eure Kameraden nicht. Ihre Gerechtigkeit wird nicht an Euch vorbeiziehen. Auch Ihr werdet sterben."

languages.text: « Vous l'avez dit vous-même : personne n'est pur, ce qui vous inclut, vous et les vôtres. Vous n'échapperez pas à la justice d'Incendia. »
languages.original_text: "You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."

traits.locale_text: « Vous l'avez dit vous-même : personne n'est pur, ce qui inclut vous et vos camarades. Vous n'échapperez pas à la justice d'Incendia. »

languages.text: "Kendin söyledin: Kimse saf değildir. Buna sen ve kardeşlerin de dâhil. İncendia'nın adaleti sizi es geçmeyecek, siz de yok olacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "You have said it yourself: no one is pure, including yourself and your brethren. Her justice will not pass you by — you will perish too."

traits.locale_text: "Kendin söyledin: Kimse saf değildir. Buna sen ve kardeşlerin de dâhil. İncendia'nın adaleti sizi es geçmeyecek, siz de yok olacaksınız."
